      • fortificationPhase

        public boolean fortificationPhase(java.lang.String sourceCountryName,
                                  java.lang.String destinationCountryName,
                                  int noOfArmies)
        Method to perform fortification phase
        Parameters:
        sourceCountryName, - name of the source country of player
        destinationCountryName, - name of the destination country of the player
        noOfArmies, - number of armies to be moved
        Returns:
        true if no army need to move and false if source and destination countries are null
